devdoc.details: This contract represents a company and its projects in a carbon market.

addCompany(address,string).details: Adds a new company to the carbon market.
addCompany(address,string).return: The ID of the newly added company.

addProject(string,string,uint256).details: Adds a new project to the carbon market.

params.daystillCompletion: The number of days until project completion.

checkCCTListed(address,uint256,uint256).details: Checks if there are sufficient CCT (Carbon Credit Tokens) listed for sale for a project.

params.cctAmt: The amount of CCT to check.

checkCCTListed(address,uint256,uint256).return: A boolean indicating whether there are sufficient CCT listed for sale for the project.

checkSufficientCCT(address,uint256,uint2.details: Checks if there are sufficient CCT (Carbon Credit Tokens) for a project.

params.cctAmt: The amount of CCT to check.

checkSufficientCCT(address,uint256,uint2.return: A boolean indicating whether there are sufficient CCT for the project.

getCCTSold(uint256).details: Returns the amount of CCT sold for a project.
getCCTSold(uint256).return: The amount of CCT sold for the project.

getCompanyEthBalance(address).details: Returns the ETH balance of a company.
getCompanyEthBalance(address).return: The ETH balance of the company.

getProjectState(uint256).details: Returns the state of a specific project.

getProjectcctAmount(uint256).details: Returns the details of a specific project.

getStakedCredits(address,uint256).details: Returns the staked credits for a project.
getStakedCredits(address,uint256).return: The amount of staked credits for the project.

listCCT(address,uint256,uint256).details: Lists CCT (Carbon Credit Tokens) for sale for a project.

params.cctAmt: The amount of CCT to list for sale.

projectCompanyOwner(uint256,address).details: Checks if a project is owned by a specific company.
projectCompanyOwner(uint256,address).return: A boolean indicating whether the project is owned by the company.

sellCCT(address,uint256,uint256).details: Sells CCT (Carbon Credit Tokens) for a project.

params.cctAmt: The amount of CCT to sell.

setProjectStateComplete(uint256).details: Sets a project state to complete.

setProjectcctAmount(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the amount of CCT for a project.

params.cctAmt: The amount of CCT to set.

params.credits: The amount of credits to stake.

devdoc.title: Company
